awards.title: RIT Autonomous Drone Challenge
awards.subtitle: 2nd Place
awards.text: Developed an autonomous routine for a Parrot AR Drone using Node.js and OpenCV. My team successfully trained a Haar Classifier in order to have the drone detect Jetson's characters.

awards.title: RIT Gobblet AI Tournament
awards.subtitle: 2nd Place
awards.text: My team developed a Java player for the board game 'Gobblet' that placed second in the department AI tournament. Our AI used primarily game strategy and pruning to win.

awards.title: FIRST Tech Challenge Robotics Oregon Championship
awards.subtitle: Winning Alliance
awards.text: I co-founded and captained my high school's FTC team. My senior year we were in the winning alliance at the Oregon state championship and progressed to the world championships in St. Louis.

awards.title: FIRST Tech Challenge Robotics Nevada Championship
awards.subtitle: Inspire Award
awards.text: I co-founded and captained my high school's FTC team. My senior year we made a trip to Nevada where we were a team captain in the finals and won the inspire award.
